alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Southern Worcester; Western Norfolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 3:22PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A slow moving strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Norfolk, eastern Worcester and south central Middlesex Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 321 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Medway, or near Franklin, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds of up to 40 mph and pea size hail. Torrential downpours in and near this thunderstorm can also be expected. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Natick, Franklin, Needham, Norwood, Milford, Wellesley, Walpole, Sharon, Foxborough, Bellingham, Hopkinton, Westwood, Holliston, Medway, Medfield, Norfolk, Wrentham, Blackstone, Millis and Upton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Southern Worcester; Western Norfolk
